subject: WESTERN UNION PAYMENT CENTER.
body:
WESTERN UNION PAYMENT CENTER.
95 ST FINBARR'S COLLEGE RD, AKOKA 100213, LAGOS
24 HOURS BANKING SERVICE.
Greetings from Western Union Money Transfer/Money Gram Agent Location.
We here to acknowledge you that our western union bureau have received
a correspondence from the federal high court based on the instruction
passed to this Money Gram department from the office of the Governor
of the Central Bank, a total sum of USD$950,000 Nine Hundred And Fifty
Thousand United States Dollars only) has been instructed to be paid to
all the people that there funds transfer were stopped withheld or
confiscated at the Ecowas office from any of the African Countries
According to the explanations made, the Central Bank of the Country of
Origin of your fund and the Government, have decided to take over the
issue of your transfer, to save you from all wire transfer problems.
This is to help us check-mate all the fraudulent activities going on
here in West Africa at large. You shall be paid bit by bit until your
total sum is completely received right from the Counter of any Money
Gram closest to you. We have been asked to release to you a total of
US$7,000 in every Seven Hours (7hours) until the funds is completely
paid, as that is the maximum limit we are legally allowed to pay in a
particular transaction.
After the failure in the transfer of your fund through other means
which may have been made impossible by the European, American or
British high commission and other bodies, I was ordered from the
office of the President and the Central Bank Of Benin to make your
payment swiftly via this medium, you will be receiving $7,000 every
seven hours, till your payment is completed.
Only charge in receiving this payment is the cost of IMF sign and
stamp fee as it was required by IMF.
The required fee should be sent through Money Gram. Upon the receipt
of the $45 USD, your receivers name will be activated to enable you
receive your first installment payment of $7,000 immediately. 
Note:
You can not be able to start picking up the money until your Name is
activated to the system. Immediately we receive the payment, we shall
activate your name to enable you start receiving your payment
immediately.
The Receivers Information For The $45 is as follows:
Receiver's Name: Okechukwu Peter
Address:95 ST FINBARR'S COLLEGE RD, AKOKA 100213, LAGOS
Country Nigeria
City:Lagos
Amount:$45
Note: For security reasons, you are advised to keep your information
confidential till your Payment is processed and your money remitted to
you in whatever manner.
Mr.Richard E.Cohen

subject: Re: WESTERN UNION PAYMENT CENTER.
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite a lot to take in, but I'm trying my best to understand it all. 

So, if I got this right, there's a sum of USD Nine Hundred And Fifty Thousand United States Dollars that has been instructed to be paid to me? That's an enormous amount! But why was my fund transfer stopped or withheld at the Ecowas office?

Also, you mentioned that I will be receiving this payment bit by bit every seven hours. Could you please explain more about how this process works? 

And lastly, you mentioned something about an IMF sign and stamp fee. How much is this fee exactly? And why is it required by the IMF?

I'm sorry for all the questions. As I said earlier, I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Robert
